content.question: In Miranda v. Arizona (1966), the Supreme Court ruled that

choices.label: women had a constitutional right to abortion
voting districts had to contain the same number of people
school prayer was illegal under the First Amendment
arrested persons must be informed of their rights

content.answer: arrested persons must be informed of their rights

topic.text: 8.10: The African American Civil Rights Movement (1960s)

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
